item.title: Nebula v1.4.9
item.sparkle:description:
Nebula v1.4.9 introduces new features, bug fixes, and improvements.
- Fixed Controller bug in previous version. Added 'Use Generic Controller' setting.
- Added 'Use Generic Controller' setting.
- Added Mods and Co-op support for games. Mods are new and we'll continue to develop and add new mods for games over time.
- Fixed bugs with server connection and other minor bugs
- Fixed UI bug with changing between Grid view and List view
- Nebula VPN is still not added in this update due to technical complications with Apple. We'll fix it and send it in the next update soon.
